creditline: Gift of Kaywin Feldman in honor of Casey Riley
inscription: on verso, written in pencil in TL corner: PSX (underscored)/1750 (50 underscored twice) | on verso, written in pencil at top: see Taft p 259/ See Brittanica 11th ed/ vol 11, p. 553 | under image, BR, printed in black ink: ST. PAUL. | on recto, under title, printed in black ink: A Sioux Chief, and Leader of the Indian Massacre of 1862, in Minnesota | on recto, printed in black ink, at bottom: Entered according to Act of Congress, by J. E. Whitney, in the year 1862, in the Clerk's Office of the U.S. District Court for Minnesota.
signed: on recto, printed in black ink, under BL corner of image: Whitney, | under image, BC, printed in black ink : LITTLE CROW
title: Little Crow
